thread.title: Best Drivers in America: Safest is Kansas City, KS - Boston number 200
thread.title_full: Best Drivers in America: Safest is Kansas City, KS - Boston number 200

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Best Drivers in America: Safest is Kansas City, KS - Boston number 200
text:
List of the 200 safest cities to drive in the United States Best Drivers in America: Safest is Kansas City, KS - Boston number 200   
Sep 01, 2015 eTN   
Allstate Insurance Company today released its eleventh annual "Allstate America's Best Drivers Report. Kansas City, Kansas ranked as the safest among America's 200 largest cities in terms of car collision frequency. 
Boston, MA ranked number 200 
The Allstate America's Best Drivers Report was created to facilitate an ongoing dialogue on safe driving that saves lives. Kansas City, Kansas, as the safest driving city in America with the average driver experiencing an auto collision every 13.3 years, which is 24.8 percent less likely than the national average of every 10 years. 
Here is the ranking for 200 U.S. Cities" 1
